moves.name: Be Vulnerable
moves.trigger: Put yourself on the line with an action that could end badly for you.
moves.text:
10+: You do it and it's wonderful.
7-9: You do it, but the MC chooses a complication.

moves.name: Care
moves.trigger: Remove an existing negative status or story tag from you, an ally, or around you.
moves.text:
Hit: Remove a number of story tags or status tiers equal to Power.
7-9: Gain a tier-1 negative status as side effect.

moves.name: Get a Clue
moves.text:
Hit: Gain Clues equal to Power. Spend to ask questions.
7-9: They can choose a complication.

moves.name: Resist
moves.trigger: Avoid a status someone is trying to impose on you.
moves.text:
10+: Fend off the effect.
7-9: Take the status with one less tier.

moves.name: Slay
moves.trigger: Impress or kick someone's butt, giving them a status even if they don't want it.
moves.text:
Hit: Give status with tier = Power.
7-9: Choose one upgrade.
10+: Choose two upgrades.

moves.name: Strike a Pose
moves.trigger: Prepare for action and boost yourself or an ally.
moves.text:
Hit: Gain Juice equal to Power. Spend to create tags/status.
10+: At least 2 Juice; can spend on upgrades.

moves.name: Talk It Out
moves.trigger: Resolve a problem by talking about it.
moves.text:
Hit: Choose one: progress, deal, or bond.
7-9: They choose a complication.

moves.name: Downtime
moves.trigger: When you get time for yourself.
moves.text: Choose an option: Train, Relationships, Self care, Deepen relationship, Prepare, Recover burnt tags.
